contacts.name: Sandy Smith

notes.content: Spoke with Sandy Smith who instructed me to reach out to Kim Kane in the finance department to clarify the amount that needs to be paid
Kim Kane clarified that the amount to be paid is $5,271.45

subItems.title: Setup Account
subItems.content: Must setup account to deliver payment

subItems.title: Transfer funds
subItems.content: Funds must be transferred from Lemon Bank to Lime Bank before payment.
